call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - October 9th

topics.title: Marketing Strategy Community vs Paid Discussion
topics.summary: Discussion about the effectiveness of grassroots community marketing versus paid marketing agencies. Kushti argues that community marketing with 'skin in the game' is more creative and effective than paid marketing which produces generic content.

topics.title: Ergo 6.0 Activation and Sub-blocks Development
topics.summary: Ergo 6.0 successfully activated with flawless deployment. New parameter for sub-blocks per block is now voteable by miners with 50% threshold for changes, similar to block size parameters.

topics.title: Sigma SDK Smart Contract Examples Generation
topics.summary: Using AI agents to generate ErgoScript contract examples from old forum designs including whitelist transfers, stealth addresses, and cold wallets with withdrawal limits. These serve as building blocks for more complex financial machinery.

topics.title: GitCircles Developer Platform Progress Update
topics.summary: GitCircles platform development progressing with balance functionality working and deployment preparations underway. Plans to onboard various developing communities for Rust libraries and other Ergo ecosystem dependencies.

topics.title: Chain Cash and Basis Development Status
topics.summary: Chain Cash fully on-chain implementation progressing with some actions working but others buggy. Basis off-chain cache system using trackers discussed as early-stage research with various trust minimization options including federation and rollup approaches.

topics.title: New USD Stable Coin Oracle Development
topics.summary: New USD Oracle pool running smoothly with plans for quick deployment of new stable coin. Goal is to bring efficient algorithmic stable coin liquidity to other ecosystems like Binance Smart Chain and Cardano.

topics.title: Cyberverse Gaming Development Highlights
topics.summary: Cyber Citizen NFTs now generating CYPX rewards. Multiplayer combat system first build tested with two-player real-time movement and combat. Environment improvements include animated trees and plants in Siberia city.

topics.title: Twitter Raiders Community Marketing Initiative
topics.summary: New Raiders Telegram group with 20 members for coordinated Twitter engagement campaigns. 15-minute raid sessions with like and retweet targets, Google Drive for promotional content sharing, and plans for both technical and non-technical content creation.

topics.title: Colorado Springs Ergo Meetup Event Details
topics.summary: Detailed schedule for upcoming Colorado Springs meetup including speakers LGD/MGPi on Gluon, Cheese on Lithos Protocol, Cannon's community presentation, mining workshop, and Ann on Machina Finance. Event includes streaming, beer, and Korean barbecue dinner.

topics.title: Future Meetup Planning and Academic Outreach
topics.summary: Discussion of potential future meetups including Anarkapulco Mexico in February 2026 and New York with Cornell integration. Emphasis on targeting Bitcoin OGs, academic researchers, and Scala/Rust developer conferences for broader outreach.
